TopicTitle: Aldan: mid career biome hopper with style

Articles.Content:
**The Aldan**

Stock mid career biome hopper for medium-low gravity airless worlds. With launch kit to orbit included

![Ulrx00Hl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Ulrx00Hl.jpg)![q9paVPtl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/q9paVPtl.jpg)![JcBlkwyl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/JcBlkwyl.jpg)

**Stats**:

Parts count: 119 (209 parts with launch kit)

Full weight: 74.353 ton 

Dry weight: 24.913 ton

dV: 3509 m/s

Acceleration: 4.8 - 13.6 m/s\*s

**Action groups:**

1 - toggle solar panels

2 - toggle ladders

7, 8, 9, 0 - toggle lights

Max landing vertical speed no more than 10 m/s! Rapid unplanned disassembly warning if exceeded!

Launch kit ascent profile is simple and reminds pre 1.0 times: straight up to 15 km on full throttle, then start slow gravity turn, circularize orbit with Aldan's engines.
